summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, the Seattle Building Code, and the Housing and Building Maintenance Code; amending Sections 22.206.160, 23.44.041, 23.84.028, and 23.90.019 of the Seattle Municipal Code, relating to accessory dwelling units; and, if approved by the State of Washington, amending Section 310.6 of the Seattle Building Code relating to minimum ceiling heights in dwelling units.
